entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
